Detailed Description

RequestPacket for adding a user to the database.

After the normal header the request packet contains: {tabular}{lll} Pos & Size & Destription \ USER_REQUEST_HEADER_SIZE & 2 bytes & Number elements \ +2 & 2 bytes & Strlen passwd \ +4 & 4 bytes & changerUIN \ +8 & string & passwd \ for Number elements & data & Elements \ {tabular}

Definition at line 148 of file UserPacket.h.

AddUserRequestPacket::AddUserRequestPacket (  uint16  packetID,
uint16  requestID,
UserUser *  user,
const char *  passwd,
uint32  changerUIN
) 
 

Constructor.

Parameters:
packetID is the id of the packet.
requestID is the id of the request sending the packet.
user is the user to add. NB: UIN must be 0!.
passwd is the password which the user logs on with
changerUIN The UIN for the user adding the user.
